title: Example: OCDS Use-case indicators
description: A subset of OCDS use-case indicators as defined in https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1j-Y0ktZiOyhZzi-2GSabBCnzx6fF5lv8h1KYwi_Q9GM/view reimagined in a machine-readable format as proof-of-concept

indicators.title: Total Number of Procedures
indicators.description: The total number of procedures indicates the size of the procurement market

indicators.title: Total number of procuring entities
indicators.description: The total number of procuring entities or buyers indicates the size of the procurement market
indicators.calculationMethod: Count of unique procuring entities (or buyers)

indicators.title: Total number of unique bidders
indicators.description: A higher number of unique bidders may indicate greater system openness and potential for competition.
